Sudoku Puzzle Game
By Dynamic DEVs

-## Features +This is a Desktop Sudoku Puzzle Game and also it has some exciting features and Rules. + +## Exciting Features and Rules 1. In the Appearance button on the menu bar, you can change the Font Size, Grid Color, Highlight Color, Background Color 3. You can see the solution if you fail to solve 3 times
